## Vote
I am requesting a vote to ...

Do you approve ... ?

## Reactions
:+1 - approve
:-1 - deny (please add comment explaining why)
:eyes - abstained (please add comment explaining why)

## Due to
I'd ask you to cast your vote with 72h (3 days).
